MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH42 postcode area of East Dunbar. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 07.47am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still investigating the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:47am on Friday, 22 January 2021
